item.title: Basic but Useful R Tips
item.description: Data Exploration I code in tidyverse universe plus tidylog to output all message corresponding to changes made to vector, dataframe, tibble, etc. Please find tidylog package @ https://github.com/elbersb/tidylog. An initial step is often to preview a dataset. An alternative to summary is describe in Hmisc package. The benefits will be it counts number of NAs as summary does, but it also show a frequency table for factor/character.
